statements: SELECT * FROM GMOCropYields
SELECT crop_name, yield_in_tons FROM GMOCropYields WHERE GMO_affected = TRUE
SELECT crop_name, yield_in_tons FROM GMOCropYields WHERE growing_season >= 3 ORDER BY yield_in_tons DESC
SELECT count(*) as total_records FROM GMOCropYields
SELECT AVG(yield_in_tons) as average_yield FROM GMOCropYields WHERE crop_name LIKE 'S%'
SELECT * FROM GMOCropYields WHERE yield_in_tons > 5 ORDER BY crop_name DESC;
SELECT crop_name, yield_in_tons FROM GMOCropYields WHERE GMO_affected = TRUE ORDER BY yield_in_tons DESC;
SELECT id, growing_season FROM GMOCropYields WHERE crop_name LIKE '%beans%' AND GMO_affected = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM GMOCropYields WHERE crop_name = 'Corn' AND yield_in_tons BETWEEN 3.5 AND 6.5;
SELECT id, crop_name, yield_in_tons FROM GMOCropYields WHERE growing_season >= 3 AND growing_season <= 6 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM crops WHERE season_year = 2021;
SELECT crop_name, yield_kg FROM crops WHERE crop_name = 'Potato';
SELECT * FROM crops ORDER BY season_year DESC;
SELECT crop_name, yield_kg FROM crops WHERE yield_kg > 1000;
SELECT crop_name, season_year FROM crops WHERE crop_id = 3;
SELECT crop_id, crop_name FROM crops WHERE season_year > 2020 ORDER BY crop_name DESC;
SELECT crop_name, season_year, yield_kg FROM crops WHERE season_year BETWEEN 2018 AND 2021 ORDER BY yield_kg DESC;
SELECT * FROM crops WHERE crop_name LIKE 'Potato%' ORDER BY season_year, yield_kg;
SELECT c.crop_name, c.season_year, g.trait FROM crops c JOIN gmos g ON c.crop_id = g.gmo_id WHERE g.trait = 'Resistance' ORDER BY c.season_year;

SELECT c.crop_name, c.yield_kg, g.gmo_name, g.trait FROM crops c JOIN gmos g ON c.crop_id = g.gmo_id WHERE c.yield_kg > 5000 AND g.experimental_group = 'Group_A' ORDER BY c.yield_kg DESC, c.crop_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM crop_data;
SELECT crop_name, yield_per_season FROM crop_data ORDER BY crop_name ASC;
SELECT season_year, start_date, end_date FROM growing_season WHERE season_year > 2020;
SELECT crop_name, impact_description, impact_rating FROM crop_data JOIN gmo_impact ON crop_data.crop_id = gmo_impact.crop_id;
SELECT * FROM growing_season WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM crop_data WHERE crop_name = 'Tomato'
SELECT crop_name, yield_per_season FROM crop_data WHERE yield_per_season > 500
SELECT impact_description, impact_rating FROM gmo_impact INNER JOIN growing_season ON gmo_impact.season_id = growing_season.season_id WHERE season_year = 2020
SELECT * FROM crop_data ORDER BY crop_id DESC
SELECT crop_name, impact_description, impact_rating FROM crop_data INNER JOIN gmo_impact ON crop_data.crop_id = gmo_impact.crop_id
SELECT * FROM crops
SELECT crop_name, planting_date, harvest_date FROM crops ORDER BY planting_date DESC
SELECT farmer_name, location, contact_number FROM farmers WHERE location='California'
SELECT season_year, start_date, end_date FROM seasons WHERE season_year=2022
SELECT crop_name, planting_date, harvest_date, yield FROM crops WHERE yield > 100
SELECT crop_name, planting_date, harvest_date FROM crops WHERE yield > 1000 ORDER BY planting_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM crops JOIN farmers ON crops.id = farmers.id WHERE location = 'California' AND crop_name LIKE '%corn%';
SELECT farmer_name, location, season_year FROM farmers JOIN seasons ON farmers.id = seasons.id WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY season_year ASC LIMIT 5;

SELECT gmo_effects.id, crop_name, season_year, effect_description FROM gmo_effects JOIN crops ON gmo_effects.crop_id = crops.id JOIN seasons ON gmo_effects.season_id = seasons.id ORDER BY season_year DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM farmers WHERE contact_number LIKE '%555%' ORDER BY location ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM test_fields WHERE location = 'Field A';
SELECT crop_name, yield_in_tons FROM crops WHERE yield_in_tons > 5;
SELECT gmo_name, gmo_type FROM gmos WHERE effectiveness > 0.8;
SELECT * FROM growing_seasons WHERE year = 2022;
SELECT crop_name, season FROM crops ORDER BY crop_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM crops WHERE season = 2;
SELECT crop_name, yield_in_tons FROM crops WHERE yield_in_tons > 5;
SELECT gmo_name, gmo_type FROM gmos WHERE effectiveness > 0.75;
SELECT location, acres FROM test_fields WHERE soil_type = 'clay';
SELECT c.crop_name, gc.quantity, s.year FROM crops c JOIN gmo_crops gc ON c.crop_id = gc.crop_id JOIN growing_seasons s ON gc.season_id = s.season_id WHERE gc.quantity > 10 AND s.year = 2021;
